'''1.20.5 Pre-Release 3''' (known as '''1.20.5-pre3''' in the launcher) is the third pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.20.5]], released on April 16, 2024,<ref>{{mcnet|minecraft-1-20-5-pre-release-3|Minecraft 1.20.5 Pre-Release 3}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Data pack]]'''
* The [[data pack version]] is now <code>41</code>.

'''[[Tag]]'''
* Removed entity type tag <code>#punchable_projectiles</code>.
* Added entity type tag <code>#redirectable_projectile</code> for projectiles which can be redirected by player attacks and projectiles.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.20.5 Pre-Release 3
|;dev
|269384|Panorama sometimes spins quickly when exiting world.
|270097|Crash when {{cd|set_ominous_bottle_amplifier}} item modifier sets out-of-range amplifier.
|270375|The screen repetitively flashes when changing the render distance and biome blend settings.
|270608|Projectiles can no longer deflect ghast fireballs.
|270609|Client requires a tick between {{cd|StoreCookiePacket}} and {{cd|TransferPacket}} for cookie to be stored.
|270634|Fireworks shot from Dispensers go much higher than before.
|270668|Item data serialization is significantly slower than before.
|;prev
|270799|Player can no longer sprint/walk across one block gaps since 1.20.5 Pre-Release 2.
}}</onlyinclude>
